title: Apple releasing iOS 15.4, macOS 12.3, and other updates next week
content:
Following Apple’s special event on Tuesday, the company announced that it will finally release iOS 15.4, watchOS 8.5, tvOS 15.4, and macOS Monterey 12.3 to all users next week.

more…

The post Apple releasing iOS 15.4, macOS 12.3, and other updates next week appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple announced that it will finally release iOS 15.4, watchOS 8.5, tvOS 15.4, and macOS Monterey 12.3 to all users next week.
